//bot_token: This is the token for your Discord bot. Keep it private and secure.
//qbittorrent_url: The URL of your qBittorrent Web UI. (Keep as localhost if you run qBittorrent on the same desktop!)
//qbittorrent_username: The username for accessing the qBittorrent Web UI. (Default = admin)
//qbittorrent_password: The password for accessing the qBittorrent Web UI. (Default) = adminadmin
//allowed_role_id: The ID of the role that is allowed to use specific commands.
//cmd_print: Set to true if you want to print command execution details.
//statuses: List of status messages for the bot to display.
statuses: You can add as many statuses as you want
